entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:42 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 08:42 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:42 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
